title: Miner (v. 1.0)
description:
All art and programming are by me.

This is still a work in progress.  Features I'd like to add:
Selling rocks for money.
Buying upgrades to your pick to mine faster.
Finding random other resources in the rocks.
Buying upgrades to dig deeper into the cave to improve chances of finding valuable resources.
The Shovel doesn't do anything now.  I'd like to make it so you need to shovel the rocks into a wheelbarrow and ship off to sell them.
Add music
Add sound effects

Known bugs:
Sometimes the pick swing animation doesn't happen but you still damage the rocks. (I think this is related to blinking)
instructions:
Use WASD or the Arrow keys to move around.

Press space to swing your pick at the pile of rocks.

You can walk outside the cave, but there isn't much out there yet.
